this post critically examines the topic of data privacy, questioning whether there is still a right to informational self-determination in today's digital age. the author suggests that individuals need to take action to protect their personal information and not simply give it away without thought or care. the hashtags #datenprivatsphÃ¤re (data privacy) and #informationelleselbstbestimmung (informational self-determination) are used to reach a wider audience and encourage discussion on the topic.
